reviewText: I have been watching a lot of Vietnam war documentaries and this is definitely one of my favorites. It's four dvd's. The first one is a bit slow but if you stick it out the rest are very good, especially the last one which I considered excellent. Great vintage film, good interviews and very good narration. Worth buying.
Great example of why we need to let the military fight our wars and keep our politicians from dictating rules of engagement.
